name: Life in the Abyss
description:
Life in The Abyss is currently a one-screen, fast paced wave-based survival game where you dodge around a variety of creatures and dart between single-use power orbs.

You are trapped in the abyss, and your only goal is to survive as long as possible.

Content right now:

- 6 upgradeable power orbs

- 1 character

- 1 stage

- 5 to 10 minutes of playtime

Controls:

1. WASD or left joystick to move
